sentences.sContent: He matriculated in the English Literature Department at the Tokyo Imperial University.
sentences.sCn: 他被东京帝国大学英语文学系录取了。

remMethod.val: matr(母亲) + iculate → 成为母校 → 录取

words.tran: 入学考试；大学入学许可；录取入学

trans.tranOther: In some countries, if you matriculate, you register formally as a student at a university, or you satisfy the academic requirements necessary for registration for a course
